entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind light except west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near Juan de Fuca Strait early in the morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
